input_text:
Job Title: Program Manager III

Location: Redmond, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Summary:

The ideal candidate will manage strategic outreach and policy campaigns to advance the values and interests of the company. The individual will advocate on the value of AR and AI, and the positive economic and social impact it is having in the world today and into the future. The team is very supportive, and the ideal candidate will be working with a team of talented individuals! The ideal candidate will be right in the thick of the most advanced technological advancements, helping to evangelize these innovative new technologies.

Role Responsibilities (including, but not limited to):

Coordinate projects, making detailed plans to accomplish goals and helping to develop, integrate and execute policy program and public affairs activitiesPresent and explain proposals, reports and findings to both internal and external partnersAnalyze resource needs and policy impact to plan and assess the feasibility of projectsConfer with management, policy and public affairs teams to discuss project specifications and proceduresReview and recommend contracts and cost estimatesDevelop and review product designs and changesConsult or negotiate with internal and external partners to prepare project specifications

Educational Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in business administration or a related field. Master’s degree preferred

Must-Have Skills:

Ability to develop, plan and execute events, partnerships and programming in real-world environmentsAbility to analyze and synthesize technology policy issues and build programs and partnerships relevant to these issuesAbility to work independently and to work collaboratively across horizontal XFN functionsKnowledge of the tech environment, ideally with a focus on public policy and the digital economy

Soft Skills:

Verbal and written communication skillsProblem solving skillsAttention to detailInterpersonal skillsStrong ability to work independentlyStrong management skillsStrong ability to work horizontally and collaboratively, both internally and externally

Compensation:

The pay rate range above is the base hourly pay range that Aditi Consulting reasonably expects to pay someone for this position (compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including but not limited to, a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies, experience, location and end client requirements).

Benefits and Ancillaries:

Medical, dental, vision, PTO benefits and ancillaries may be available for eligible Aditi Consulting employees and vary based on the plan options selected by the employee.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
